QuestData.Title: Stinging Barbs
QuestData.Description:
The Outrigger hunters exhibit the pinnacle of Kul Tiran brawn. But they would indubitably be unable to succeed in taking down the most impressive of their prey without my own inventions!
I present to you, the most ordinary of harpoons. However, with just a tad of gnomish ingenuity, this average weapon can become so much more!
All that I need are barbs from the rays in the harbor. Using them, I can fashion a poison that can stun even the most colossal of sea monsters!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Venomous Barbs from Barbtail Stingrays.
QuestData.CompletionText: Be careful with those stingers, $n! They'd put someone of your frame down easily!
QuestData.RewardText: Well throw me a hammer and call me Nancy!$b$bThank you kindly pal. This should be plenty! I'll get to work!
